description.en: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.ar: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.br: Uma estátua que segue seu mestre e coleta itens do chão.
description.cns: 心情糟糕的獬豸宝宝跟随它的主人，并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ehrwürdiger Steinlöwe, welcher dir überall hin folgt und deine Items einsammelt.
description.fi: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.fil: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un lion chinois qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Seekor Baby Fu Lion yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling, mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.jp: ブレッキンシーサーを召喚させ、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 근엄한 해태를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.pl: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.ru: Маленькая ши-цза, которая послушно семенит за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Un León Fu Bebé que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: A Baby Fu Lion with a bad hair day that follows it's owner around, picking up dropped items.
description.th: Baby Fu Lionซึ่งตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ หยิบสิ่งของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除嚴肅的嚴肅的石獅. 召喚時,將會自動撿取週邊的道具.
description.vi: Một chú sư tử Baby Fu với một ngày tóc tệ hại theo chủ nhân của nó đi khắp nơi, nhặt những món đồ bị đánh rơi.
